items.title: Arnold and Nuke - Light and Compositing a 3d Cinematic Shot
items.headline: Learn how to light and composite an amazing cinematic scene in Arnold and Nuke a create your own shot for you portfolio.
objectives_summary: Learn how to light and composite a 3d shot using Arnold render and Nuke by applying the techniques used by large VFX studios such as deep compositing, 2d motion blur and multilight compositing and light groups.
All the Maya assets and EXRs renders are provided in order to follow the lessons and create your own custom version of the shot for your demo reel.
